update zjk_search_log set sys_flag=#{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_order=#{dataOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user=#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_disp=#{createUserDisp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date=#{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user=#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_disp=#{modifyUserDisp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_code=#{formCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date=#{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name=#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, es_id=#{esId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keyword=#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword_ik=#{keywordIk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select data_id, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, form_code, status, audit_status, update_user, update_date, project_id, project_name, es_id, keyword, keyword_ik, bak1, bak2 from zjk_search_log where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and form_code like '%${formCode}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and project_id like '%${projectId}%'
and project_name like '%${projectName}%'
and es_id like '%${esId}%'
and keyword like '%${keyword}%'
and keyword_ik like '%${keywordIk}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
SELECT * from (SELECT count(keyword) as es_id,keyword from zjk_search_log GROUP BY keyword ) t order by t.es_id desc LIMIT 0,10
